en.today: The Moon migrates into Sagittarius and the sector of your chart that governs luck, sweet ram. Maintain a positive attitude, as wishful thinking can have real-world consequences. These vibes also encourage a generous spirit, so be mindful to spread love and joy whenever you can. A soft connection between Luna and  Pluto can transform connections, helping you deepen relationships with anyone who feels at arm's length. Meanwhile, Uranus and Neptune align overhead, showering you with excitement. A psychic and magickal charge accompanies you under this cosmic climate, making it easier to ask for and receive divine guidance.

en.today: The Moon moves into Sagittarius and aligns with Pluto, dear Leo, bringing a charge to your heart center. Flow with the people and activities that move you, soaking up the inspiration and motivation you receive. Sharpened instincts will propel you into action, enabling you to leap toward your personal goals with confidence. Themes around loyalty also come into play, and you'll feel increasingly devoted to those who have your back. Meanwhile, Uranus and Neptune form a soft sextile, altering your visions for the future. Rework long-term aspirations as new ideas trickle in and electrify your sense of ambition.

en.today: A cleansing energy inspires you to purge the unnecessary from your life, dear Taurus. As the Moon enters Sagittarius and aspects Pluto, bulldoze obstacles or dead weight that have made upward climbs feel more difficult. Your sense of empowerment grows if success-related goals are prioritized over clutter, noise, and drama. Meanwhile, Uranus and Neptune collaborate amongst the cosmos, helping you attract connections who are as stylish, quirky, and free-spirited as you are. It will be easy to enchant those you encounter with true colors on display. Let your guard down just a bit, allowing others to see your eccentric side.

en.today: Let love rule you today, dear Gemini, as the Moon enters Sagittarius and aspects Pluto. Heart-expanding connections will restore your optimism, making it essential that you connect with people who allow you to feel seen. Offer encouragement and receive it when it's returned. Now is also a good time to check in with your sense of balance, considering what you can release and add to current agendas. A sweet connection between Uranus and Neptune charges up the imagination, inspiring new long-term aspirations. However, these dreams won't take shape if you don't put in the effort to actualize them.

kh.today: សូមឱ្យក្តីស្រឡាញ់គ្រប់គ្រងអ្នកនៅថ្ងៃនេះ Gemini ជាទីស្រឡាញ់នៅពេលដែលព្រះច័ន្ទចូលក្នុង Sagittarius និងទិដ្ឋភាពផ្លាតូ។ការតភ្ជាប់បេះដូងដែលកំពុងភ្ជាប់បេះដូងនឹងស្តារសុទិដ្ឋិនិយមរបស់អ្នកដែលធ្វើឱ្យវាចាំបាច់ដែលអ្នកភ្ជាប់ជាមួយមនុស្សដែលអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យអ្នកមានអារម្មណ៍ថាបានឃើញ។ផ្តល់ការលើកទឹកចិត្តហើយទទួលវានៅពេលដែលវាត្រឡប់មកវិញ។ឥឡូវនេះក៏ជាពេលវេលាដ៏ល្អផងដែរក្នុងការឆែកឆេរដោយសមតុល្យរបស់អ្នកដោយពិចារណាលើអ្វីដែលអ្នកអាចបញ្ចេញនិងបន្ថែមរបៀបវារៈបច្ចុប្បន្ន។ការតភ្ជាប់ផ្អែមរវាងអ៊ុយរ៉ានុសនិងណិបតុនចោទប្រកាន់ការស្រមើលស្រមៃដោយជម្រុញសេចក្តីប្រាថ្នារយៈពេលវែងថ្មី។ទោះយ៉ាងណាក្តីសុបិន្តទាំងនេះនឹងមិនមានរូបរាងទេប្រសិនបើអ្នកមិនខិតខំប្រឹងប្រែងដើម្បីធ្វើឱ្យពួកគេមានលក្ខណៈជាក់ស្តែង។
